description: They say it's what's inside that counts but everyone so often, we're lucky enough to run across a guy who has it all...looks, personality, body and brains and if that wasn't enough, a tasty looking nine inch dick as a handle to this super-sized full meal deal. Cooker is a 26 year old chef and damn, I'd rather be eating him for the meal instead of having him preparing it.A big shiny smile, an adorable face, a hot toned body, rock hard glutes and oh yes, that oversized joystick! He's so open and honest during his interview and after hearing his whole family shares some of his special physical attributes, we're thinking an invitation to Thanksgiving dinner might be the photo opportunity of a lifetime. After bearing his soul, he bared the rest and clearly enjoyed the attention of the camera as it checked out every nook and cranny! Oh yes, the lens loved him right back - especially that set of low-hangers that looked like a pair of bowling balls in a skin covered carrying case. That case didn't stay full but he didn't as much just shoot a load on his stomach as participate in a primal reproductive rite of passage as he growled, howled and spewed forth a white gusher of extra special sauce!!
title: Wang, Hang and Bang
